mapper.select: select user_id, user_name from mobility.user_info_mst where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into mobility.user_info_mst (user_id, user_pw, user_name, regist_user, regist_dt) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{regist_user}, Convert(Char(6), GetDate(), 12) + Replace(Convert(Char(8), GetDate(), 24),':',''))
